overview: It's a close encounter of the anal kind! Today's reigning queen of ass-loving, Bree Olson, stars in this outrageously orgasmic anal adventure! In this campy comedy, Bree and ass-hungry girlfriends Kristina Rose, Andi Anderson, Rebeca Linares and Missy Stone invade earth looking for interplanetary booty. They get it in all ends from the hot, hung men they find to fill their tight fannies! A smoldering sextravaganza from the mind of Madness.
title: Bree's Anal Invasion
